title: Shanghai metro
description: The Shanghai Metro is a rapid transit system in Shanghai, China. It is the world's largest rapid transit system by route length.

title: London Underground (The Tube)
description: The London Underground, commonly known as the Tube, is a rapid transit system serving Greater London and some adjacent areas. It is the world's first rapid transit system.

title: New York City Subway
description: The New York City Subway is a rapid transit system in New York City, one of the world's largest and busiest subway systems.

title: Tokyo Metro
description: The Tokyo Metro is a rapid transit system in Tokyo, Japan. It is one of the busiest subway systems in the world.

title: Moscow Metro
description: The Moscow Metro is a rapid transit system serving Moscow, Russia. It is known for its ornate station architecture and efficient service.

title: Beijing Subway
description: The Beijing Subway is a rapid transit system in Beijing, China. It is one of the busiest subway systems in the world.

title: Paris Métro
description: The Paris Métro is a rapid transit system in Paris, France. It is known for its dense network and Art Nouveau station entrances.

title: Seoul Metropolitan Subway
description: The Seoul Metropolitan Subway is a rapid transit system serving the Seoul Capital Area in South Korea. It is one of the largest subway systems in the world.

title: Berlin U-Bahn
description: The Berlin U-Bahn is a rapid transit system in Berlin, Germany. It is known for its extensive network and historical significance.

title: Madrid Metro
description: The Madrid Metro is a rapid transit system serving Madrid, Spain. It is one of the largest metro systems in Europe.
